summary: This document is a collection of administrative records from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated August 6, 2019. It includes official count sheets, out-count forms, and inmate rosters detailing the location and status of inmates, including Jeffrey Epstein who is listed in a special housing unit (Z04-206LAD). The records show routine prison operations on the day of Epstein's death.

events.title: Prison Counts and Inmate Status
events.description: Routine administrative counts and status checks of inmates at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, including out-counts and housing assignments.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is listed as inmate 76318-054, housed in Special Housing Unit Z04-206LAD under an 'ATTY' (attorney visit) assignment category on August 6, 2019.
The documents are Bureau of Prisons administrative records showing inmate counts, out-counts, and housing assignments for the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
Multiple inmates are listed with 'SUICIDE OR' watch designations on their assignments, including inmates Arias, Bang, and Mersey.
The records indicate routine prison operations, including multiple official counts throughout the day (e.g., 4:00 pm, 9:24 pm) on the date of Epstein's death.
Epstein's specific housing unit (Z04-206LAD) and his inclusion on an attorney visit roster are documented.
